errors.error_description: The 'Getting started' section incorrectly instructs the user to run `briefcase new` before showing the command to install Briefcase.
correction_candidates: The installation command (`python -m pip install briefcase`) should be presented before the usage command (`briefcase new`).
Combine the commands into a single block: `$ python -m pip install briefcase && briefcase new`.
Add a note saying 'If briefcase is not found, install it first.'
Change `$ briefcase new` to `$ python -m briefcase new`.
errors.golden_answer: The installation command (`python -m pip install briefcase`) should be presented before the usage command (`briefcase new`).
